title: [SR] Fountain Shenanigans
body:
Hey there Summoners,

Just a light hearted gameplay observation. 

With the new Summoners Rift (SR) there is that barrier blocking the exit from the fountain for the first 10 seconds. I've noticed a lot of players, and I mean a lot trying to flash this. I tried it once too.

I just thought it's pretty funny when someone does.

Regards,
lols =)

replies.body:
No but people don't know you can't. just say, its flashable and see how many people try.

What is interesting is you can TP to a turret at 20seconds and maintain the start game movespeed bonus... someone smarter then me can figure out a way to use that to your advantage
